name: A Shot in the Dark (itch)
description:
A Ludum Dare 34 Submission

Watch our trailer here:

A Shot In The Dark

Find your way, lit only by your magic crossbow bolts.
Click to move or shoot, right-click to change modes

Paul Schwarzwalder
Phoenix Smith
